p: Despite the fact that there are more commonalities than differences among DRR, CCA, and development groups, one key informant believed that flood resilience building is still seen from a sectoral and fragmented perspective in Jakarta. Moreover, another interviewee also noted the disconnection between the policy umbrella of each group, which discouraged them to collaborate.
